name: Malibu Canyon
description:
Introduction

Due to the closure of Rindge Dam, this canyon is currently closed.

Approach

Drop-in is by the intersection of Piuma Road and Malibu Canyon Road

Descent

Unless you have a wetsuit, only come on a hot day as there is a lot of swimming. There is an easy way around the dam dcl if you choose not to bring any rope.

Exit

Shuttle is required unless you want to go on a long walk back to your car.

Red tape

The Rindge Dam, through which this canyon passes, is currently closed. Palm Canyon Lane is now part of a private gated community, if exiting in that area be aware you could be fined for trespassing.

Beta sites

  • Chris Brennen's Adventure Hikes (Southwest) : Malibu Canyon

Trip reports and media

Background
